name: Kenki Ippatsu! Crane Master ni Narou!
overview: Kenki Ippatsu! Crane Master ni Narou! is a Strategy game in which you get to become a master crane operator through the various stages and challenges including pulling out fish as in the child's toy fishing game. There is also an expert course to graduate aswell as the grind of work mode where going about your duties is strangely gratifying. Only in Japan, but well worth a spin. Known as Crane Master ni Narou in Japan. See also Shovel Master and Machine master in the Kenki Ippai series. Construction Machinery Exhibition-based simulation game where you can experience the operation of cranes, rough-terrain vehicle Len working on the street. And master courses and caught a big fish with a crane, "Let's catch a fish" mini-game fishing Quirky, trick variety enters joined, you can enjoy the operation of construction machinery easily longer.
